meanings.definition: Capable of being stretched or expanded.
meanings.sent1: The balloon was distensible, so it could hold a lot of air.
meanings.sent2: The rubber band is distensible, allowing it to stretch easily.
meanings.sent3: The distensible rubber glove made funny noises when inflated.
meanings.sent4: Her distensible imagination knew no bounds, creating endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The distensible fabric of the hammock gently cradled her as she swayed.

meanings.definition: Able to be distended or swollen.
meanings.sent1: The distensible stomach expanded after a big meal.
meanings.sent2: The distensible cheeks puffed out when he blew up the balloon.
meanings.sent3: The distensible water balloon made for a hilarious game of catch.
meanings.sent4: His distensible ego grew larger with each compliment he received.
meanings.sent5: The distensible sponge soaked up all the spilled water in one go.
